attributes.action: encourage worldwide sanctions against the israili government for war crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: encourage worldwide sanctions  against the government of israil  for war crimes and the theft of arab land ? Invite a representative from the israili stop the war movement to visit the house of commons to speak to mps We have all had our lives disrupted because their greed and arrogance. to protect the British people you need to stand with the stop the war groups in israil invite them here let the land grab sect know we do not support them.

rejection.details:
There are a number of similar petitions that you may want to sign. 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WestBank/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/IsraelArms/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Bantrade/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
